VariableDescription.Name: ORB_PITCH
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******

#
#     TITLE                           ISTP despun platform attitude CDF
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics
#     SOURCE_NAME                     POLAR>Polar Plasma Laboratory
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     DATA_TYPE                       PA>Platform Attitude
#     DESCRIPTOR                      DEF>Definitive data
#     STABILIZATION_TYPE              D
#     ROTATION_SEQUENCE               ZYZ
#     MISALIGN_ANG_1                  +0.000000000
#     MISALIGN_ANG_2                  +0.000000000
#     MISALIGN_ANG_3                  +0.000000000
#     START_DATE                      1996-11-13T22:24:00.000Z
#     END_DATE                        1996-11-13T23:59:00.000Z
#     STEP_SIZE                       60000
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0156
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 PO_PA_DEF_00000000_V01
#     TEXT                            Based on the FDF DPA algorithm
#     MODS                            6/11/93 - Original Implementation
#                                     4/1/94 - Modified VALIDMIN and VALIDMAX for ORB_ROLL,
#                                     ORB_YAW, GCI_ROLL, GCI_YAW, GSE_ROLL, GSE_YAW, GSM_ROLL, and GSM_YAW
#                                     6/7/94 - CCR ISTP 1852, updated CDHF skeleton to CDF standards - JT
#                                     11/9/94 - Correct errors made in ccr 1852.  ICCR 1884
#                                     04/04/96 - Added despun plat.offset and lock status
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  PO_PA_DEF
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Platform Attitude Definitive data
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ephemeris
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. DP attitude EPOCH time
#  2. Orbital pitch angle, scalar
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Fri Dec  2 18:15:03 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Orbital pitch angle, scalar
#
EPOCH                       ORB_PITCH
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            rad
15-03-1996 00:00:00.000     0.0159525
